Main — About

About Elizé

Elizé was recently founded in 2018 in Turku, Finland. Prior to establishing ourselves in Finland, we have been in this business for four years, distributing hair from Ukraine directly to UK, US and German hair salons.

Several years ago we were specialising in selling small portions of Asian hair. The quality did not really satisfy neither us nor our clients. So we decided to found our own brand of luxury Russian Slavic hair extensions. We created Elizé.

Often a hair extension sold to you as “slavic” entangles after just one wash. We have also experienced this. So we chose to work with genuine Slavic hair only unknown to and often unreachable for the majority of hair extension vendors on the market. Unlike Indian or Asian hair, Slavic hair is naturally silky and simply does not require silicone coating to look fabulous. We have grown a huge portfolio of real Slavic hair suppliers so we could always be sure we offer the best quality.

At Elizé, we aim to provide the best services for everyone, whether you are a master or a consumer, starting from quality Slavic hair to lab-tested keratin; from individual tape designs to exclusive packaging that makes every Elizé order amusing to unbox.

Our Values

1. Precision We serve customers with premium hair extensions to ensure we both follow our path of success.

2. Market-oriented: Elizé understands the final consumer. We adapt our product range to match today’s wishes.

3. Quality first: We do quality control regularly to keep only the finest hair suppliers.

Mission

We aim to build a consolidated network of the finest quality Russian hair suppliers in Slavic countries.

Elize creates and develops the industry instead of adjusting itself to the poorly-formed international hair market.

We are eliminating poor working conditions, provide adequate fees for donors to make the deal fair and transparent for all the contributors.

Learn more
Collecting Slavic Hair
Slavic hair is highly reliable and long-lasting hair which can be easily worn in your daily life. The hair is thin, soft and suits various types of customers whose hair tends to have the same structure. Almost every type of fixation can be requested. The hair keeps having its softness when dyed at home or even bleached.
Why is it so special
Slavic hair is highly reliable and long-lasting hair which can be easily worn in your daily life. The hair is thin, soft and suits various types of customers whose hair tends to have the same structure. Almost every type of fixation can be requested. The hair keeps having its softness when dyed at home or even bleached.
